name: Save the Root
description:
Get ready to save your root system from withering rocks and omnivore moles with only magnet and fire!

Your goal is to save as many roots as possible. If the root touches the rock, then the whole branch withers. Besides, the mole can eat the root and the branch can no longer grow. You have two tools: magnet and fire. The magnet tilts the direction of the main root. The fire stops the root branch it touches from growing. Use the mouse wheel to swap between tools.
